post.body: Any New Englanders here?  I'd like to talk about hikes in VT and NH! #GoOutdoors

comment.body: @Durand: I hope to go to Europe someday and maybe even do some hiking there.
It would be cool if there were something like OpenBazaar, but distributed via ZeroNet.

@ulrichard: I just like ZeroNet!  How private is buying and selling on OpenBazaar?  I heard that it is possible to find which IPs go with OpenBazaar stores.  Is that true?  Maybe some countermeasures are possible even if that is the case.
@ulrichard: I hope the strategy works.  If you don't mind, have you used OpenBazaar?  How was your experience?
@ulrichard: Ha! I just noticed I commented on the wrong one of your posts.
